title: New Splinter Cell Finally!? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.19.21
description:
Blessing and Tam cover a HUGE news day. New Splinter Cell Finally?? Big Xbox news and EA opens a new studio!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:07:33 - Housekeeping
A new PS I Love You XOXO is up right now. Me and Janet answer a bunch of your reader mail and talk about how the PlayStation 5’s first year has been. That’s on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames and podcast services around the globe.
And speaking of Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames: Episode 2 of The Arkham Files premiered yesterday and it’s a short video by Barrett and Roger all about how Batman: Arkham City truly makes you feel like Batman. You can check that out right now on youtube.com/kindafunnygames
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Pranksy & Black Jack
The Roper Report  -
00:08:20 - A decade later, Ubisoft has finally greenlit a new Splinter Cell, sources claim - Tom Henderson @ VGC
00:10:00 - Why did it take so long, almost a decade, for it to come back? - Best Friends Q:BJ Bernardo
00:30:40 - EA’s opening a new studio in Seattle - Danielle Partis @ GiBiz
00:39:15 - Ad
00:42:10 - Microsoft's special Xbox's 20th anniversary broadcast goes live on November 15 - Jez Corden @ Windows Central
00:46:50 - Speaking of Xbox: Coming to Game Pass via Xbox Wire
00:48:15 - One more for Xbox: Sea of Thieves sails past 25 million players - Wesley Yin-Poole @ Eurogamer
00:50:05 - A PlayStation pivot: Sony testing PS5 beta for easy screenshot sharing in PS mobile app - Ed Nightingale @ Eurogamer
00:51:40 - Out today
00:53:30 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Janet and Tim
itunes:author: Kinda Funny

Blessing and Tam cover a HUGE news day. New Splinter Cell Finally?? Big Xbox news and EA opens a new studio!

00:07:33 - Housekeeping

A new PS I Love You XOXO is up right now. Me and Janet answer a bunch of your reader mail and talk about how the PlayStation 5’s first year has been. That’s on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames and podcast services around the globe.

And speaking of Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames: Episode 2 of The Arkham Files premiered yesterday and it’s a short video by Barrett and Roger all about how Batman: Arkham City truly makes you feel like Batman. You can check that out right now on youtube.com/kindafunnygames
